items.desc: RunReveal launches AI Chat for Security Investigations to enhance threat detection and response capabilities.
Analysis of the hidden challenges in staff engineering roles, including lack of transparency and uncertainty in career progression.
Chris Sanders presents a standard for creating human-centered investigation playbooks for security teams.
BlinkOps secures $50M funding for its micro agent cybersecurity platform to enhance automated threat response.
Comprehensive guide for building effective cloud security roadmaps and implementation strategies.
Palo Alto Networks acquires CyberArk for $25 billion in major cybersecurity consolidation move.
Guide for printing books at home using minimal equipment and resources for security documentation.
Drata shares best practices for successfully rolling out AI coding assistants in enterprise security environments.
Kali Linux now supports Apple containers on macOS systems, expanding penetration testing capabilities.
ACM article examining how AI is democratizing cybercrime and lowering barriers for malicious actors.
SentinelOne analysis of China's covert cyber capabilities, focusing on the Hafnium group's advanced tactics.
Digital Digging investigation reveals ChatGPT confession vulnerabilities and privacy concerns.
Yoshua Bengio's comprehensive chapter on AI security and safety considerations for enterprise deployment.
The Momentum AI Healthcare Masterclass provides comprehensive training on implementing AI solutions in healthcare settings.
OpenAI partners with Penda Health to develop AI clinical copilot technology for improved patient care in Africa.
Charta Health secures $22M Series A funding to advance its AI-powered healthcare operations platform.
Figma stock surges 250% on first trading day, valuing the design platform company at over $45 billion.
University of Florida research paper analyzes money left on the table in IPO underpricing phenomena.
Byrne's Euclid provides a template for product managers to showcase classic literature in modern digital formats.
Creative YouTube video demonstrating how to save PNG image data to a bird using AI techniques.
OpenAI collaborates with Penda Health to pioneer AI clinical copilot technology for healthcare providers.
Modal demonstrates how to transcribe speech 100x faster and 100x cheaper using open-source AI models.
Pipecat AI releases smart-turn technology for improved voice AI conversation management and turn-taking.
Phonic launches new voice AI platform for enhanced audio processing and speech recognition capabilities.
Technical analysis of GPT-4o Study Mode system prompt extraction techniques and methods.
Historical analysis exploring whether people were more inventive before the patent system was established.
Interactive transformer explainer tool for understanding how AI language models process and generate text.
Yoshua Bengio's comprehensive analysis of AI security and safety challenges for responsible development.
